mapper.update: update news set title=#{title}, author=#{author}, publish_time=#{publishTime}, content=#{content}, url=#{url}, key_word=#{keyWord} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into news(title, author, publish_time, content, url, key_word) values(#{title},#{author},#{publishTime},#{content},#{url},#{keyWord})
mapper.select: select Id as id, title as title, author as author, publish_time as publishTime, content as content, url as url, key_word as keyWord from news order by Id desc
